FuncDef:
The client command creates a TWAMP Light Control-Client and displays the TWAMP Light Control-Client view. If the Control-Client specified in the client command has been created, the command displays the Control-Client view.
The undo client command deletes a TWAMP Light Control-Client.
By default, no TWAMP Light Control-Client is created.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To create a Control-Client for a TWAMP Light test session, run the client command.
Precautions
After a TWAMP Light Control-Client is deleted, all the TWAMP Light test sessions created for this Control-Client are deleted.
The device functioning as the Sender supports only boards using the LPUI-200/LPUI-200-L/LPUF-200/LPUF-200-B/LPUI-1T/LPUI-1T-B/LPUI-1T-L/LPUI-1T-CM/LPUI-241/LPUI-241-B/LPUI-241-CM/LPUF-241/LPUF-241-E/LPUI-480-CM/LPUF-52 and LPUF-51-E/LPUI-51-E/LPUI-51-S/LPUI-51-CM/LPUF-120/LPUF-120-B/LPUF-120-E/LPUI-102-E/LPUI-120/LPUI-120-B/LPUI-120-L/LPUI-52-E/LPUI-120-E/LPUI-120-CM/LPUF-240/LPUF-240-B/LPUF-240-E/LPUI-240/LPUI-240-B/LPUI-240-CM/LPUI-240-L/LPUF-480/LPUF-480-B/LPUI-480/LPUI-480-B/LPUI-480-L/LPUF-480-E/LPUI-480-CM/LPUF-400-E boards.
